text:
Two barriers stand in the way -- #Covid19Variants & #vaccine hesitancy.

New variant more deadly & contagious. UK #B117, first in CO in Dec., has since been identified in 50 US jurisdictions. Now likely accounts for 20~30% of #COVID19 in US. & is growing 
https://t.co/92o5zd1XvP https://t.co/0zYKj5pXcz
